a very large shark that existed millions of years ago: For over 20 million years, a gigantic shark popularly known as megalodon stalked the world's oceans Some megalodon teeth were over 7 inches long.
More examplesFewer examplesA full-grown megalodon could be up to 54 feet long.Our understanding of megalodon comes mainly from its teeth. Japan and North America have yielded megalodon backbones as well.
